column5: CHICAGO Wal-Mart Stores Inc warned on Thursday that this quarter's earnings could miss Wall Street's estimates as the world's biggest retailer struggles with falling margins due to price-cutting and heavy spending on its e-commerce operations. | Video

column4: UPDATE 4-Wal-Mart's profit margins fall; quarterly outlook disappoints
column5: CHICAGO  Aug 17 Wal-Mart Stores Inc warned on Thursday that this quarter's earnings could miss Wall Street's estimates as the world's biggest retailer struggles with falling margins due to price-cutting and heavy spending on its e-commerce operations.

column4: Britain's Asda reports first sales growth in three years
column5: LONDON  Aug 17 Asda  the British supermarket arm of Wal-Mart  the world's largest retailer  on Thursday reported its first underlying sales growth for three years  helped by food price inflation and very weak comparative numbers last year.

column4: Wal-Mart's comparable sales rise for 12th straight quarter
column5: CHICAGO  Aug 17 Wal-Mart Stores Inc reported its 12th consecutive rise in quarterly comparable sales on Thursday  driven by an increase in the number of shoppers who visited stores and made purchases online.
